description: Calvin Banks is livid about being betrayed by Kory Houston. He waits till Kory comes home and confronts Kory by telling he needs to be taught a lesson. He aggressively fucks the shit out of him! Showing him who and where he belongs! Banging his ass and making him suck his cock like he should be doing! Kory takes it like the bad boy he is and understands that no one can fuck him the way Calvin just did!
title: Take it like a Bad Boy
